Trying to understand how this promo works. I just got my new account in MAY  so basically 0 balance in APR. Say i xfer fresh fund of 50k today  it will earn the bonus interest for 2 mths in MAY  and JUN?Or will i only earn the bonus rate in May  since the MAB is the same in JUN and May.Thanks

1) SMS register for the promo  earn 3.35% on May and Jun MAB (wrt to Apr MAB which is $0) and2) Transfer in $2k/$5k and do 5 transactions (e.g. FAST transfer to other bank)  earn 1% on incremental MAB wrt previous month

Ah i see. So regards to APR my MAB is 0  if i fufill point 2  i get the bonus interest and also the rewards 1% in May. But no extra rewards 1% in Jun as no increment compare to previous mth. Thanks.Best thing is just to removed the fund at end of jun?
You can always register in May and deposit on 1 Jun. May is already 1 week in
Wont i lose the bonus interest in May this way?
Unless your 50k is in an account that earns you less than 3.64% p.a.  you'd rather not touch this amount for now. Assuming you haven't transferred the money in yet.
Or wait for the promo next mth for Jun and July. Keep the account as 0 for the month of May
If you only have just 50k in that account  then actually it's better to move it since it's only earning you 3% p.a.
There's no guarantee that their promo is gonna give the same rate.

Sounds great. Actually just got my ega approve 2days ago. Thus slightly late. The time i should remove my fund is on 1st july yea? Thanks.Oh i have seen smth on controlling 2 human account for ega or smth but cant really find an explaination on that
Yup.The 1% as you previously mentioned have answered yourself.
If u have 2 humans u can move the funds out to an outside account and immediately to the other human between months.Then u can always earn the 1% incremental bonus.
Actually 2 human also hard to do right  cos of the reference month? If I do this month may   my other human next month June  then July I do  Aug he can't do liao right.. Assuming promo continue

Nope. If u control 2 humans it is assured u will get almost the max bonus interest + incremental interest for up to $360k.JanHuman A do with December reference monthFebHuman b do with January reference monthMarchHuman a do with February reference month.
Just make sure you only register each human in the bonus (SMS in) cycle when ready to start.Eg in above example human B only registers for the 3.x% promo in February.
It works easily now because Hsbc bonus interest cycle is always 2 months from reference month nowHuman A = jan Feb bonusReference month DecemberHuman b = February March bonusReference month January

Haha then the ADB for one of the account always maxed out.. best to register different

Have to adapt with their tnc modifications. Last time yes when Hsbc EGA was for 3 months then both humans register in same month. Then both humans rest one month (all move to scb esaver to cool down).Now because they play punk and change to 2 months. To avoid having issues in month 3 since month 2 will have big adb  have to stagger the registration months.
I find it easiest and clearest to use excel to track. So u won’t lose focus on the reference month and Lugi.

One more thing to note is if you've registered for last month EGA bonus interest campaign  this month you will not be eligible (it says in the registration SMS). So register only when you have the funds.
this month seems like everyone's offering 3.5% (OCBC  Stand Chart  HSBC). I find Stand Chart to be the least troublesome to fulfill
